events.title: AI PROMPT BATTLE
events.description: Creating prompts and providing required result
rules: Participation can be solo or in teams of 2
Basically participants compete to create the best prompts and see what AI generates
Rounds: Multiple rounds. Rules will be explained before each round.
Only AI tools allowed by organizers may be used (ChatGPT, DALL·E,GEMINI, etc.).
No pre-written prompts or external references allowed.
English prompts only (unless specified in theme).
Time limits are strict for each round.

events.title: FRONTEND FLUX
events.description: Front-end web development challenge where participants must replicaate a given webpage design using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
rules: Participation can be solo or in teams of 2.
Only HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript are allowed (no frameworks like Bootstrap).
No preview of code is allowed during the challenge.
Time limits must be strictly followed.
Design reference will be shown only once before the round starts.
Use of external assets or internet resources is prohibited (except provided images/logos).

events.title: CINETECH
events.description: Quiz based on cinema and science.
rules: Rounds: Multiple rounds will be conducted. Rules will be explained before each round.
Time Limit: Each question must be answered within the given time (15–30 seconds).
Scoring: Points are awarded for correct answers. No negative marking unless announced.
Tie-breaker: In case of a tie, extra questions will decide the winner.
Fair Play: No use of phones or external help. Any malpractice = direct disqualification.
Updates: Organizers may modify rules/format if needed.

events.title: IDEA SHOWCASE
events.description: Presentation of an idea or a project.
rules: Abstracts must focus on one key idea.
Slides allowed if needed but limited to 3–5 with minimal text, visuals encouraged.
Time limit is strictly enforced (3–5 minutes).
Offensive, discriminatory, or promotional content is prohibited.
Participants must report 10 minutes before their session.

HTML, CSS, JS. (frameworks like, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, SCSS  can be used if needed)
Pre-built templates or frameworks like React, Angular, etc, are not allowed.

events.title: Mobile Photography
events.description: Find and fix bugs in pre-written programs across different languages.
rules: Participants will be allowed certain time limit to take photos and submit it within the time limit

Photos can be taken in any mobile(android/iOS)
Photos taken should be raw image, usage of filters or external app will lead to disqualification
Offensive, discriminatory, or promotional content is prohibited.
Participants must report 10 minutes before their session
